page.title: 03Changes Mr.Palmer Has Seen
page.content: {Mr. Palmer}was born in{Soham,}and has lived in{Fordham}for{53}years. He started{farming}for himself when he was{23}and before that he worked for his father. During the time he has lived in{Fordham}there has been a lot of{building. Trinity Close}is so called because it used to be an{arable field belonging to{Trinity Farm. {Mr. Palmer}believes{Fordham}has changed for the better since he has lived here. Firstly{electricity}was fitted in the{village}this meant people didn't have to use{gas lamps all the time. Also{mains water}has been a big help, and{modern sewers were fitted in{1965.}One of the major changes in the{village}was when{flower {growing}became important in the{1930's before that all that was grown were {arable crops.}The price of crops had dropped and{flower growing}employed
